content:
I think crossovers between the Disney+ shows and the movies could be really interesting. It would be awesome to see characters from the shows make appearances in the movies, and vice versa. It would add an extra layer of continuity and connection between the different branches of the MCU.

However, I also think it's important to make sure that the shows and movies can stand on their own. The Disney+ shows should be able to tell their own stories and have their own arcs, without relying too heavily on the movies. And similarly, the movies should be able to be enjoyed without requiring viewers to have seen every single Disney+ show.

Maybe they could have some subtle nods or references to each other, but not necessarily full-blown crossovers. That way, fans who are invested in the entire MCU can get a sense of continuity and connection, but casual viewers can still enjoy each story on its own.
